title: Reading CoE statistics
code: coe_nomis_codes() #>    nomis_code #> 1       TS001 #> 2       TS004 #> 3      TS007A #> 4       TS021 #> 5       TS030 #> 6       TS037 #> 7       TS062 #> 8       TS066 #> 9       TS067 #> 10      TS011 #> 11      TS025 #> 12      TS044 #> 13      TS045 #> 14      TS054 #> 15      TS003 #>                                                                    description #> 1  TS001 - Number of usual residents in households and communal establishments #> 2                                                     TS004 - Country of birth #> 3                                             TS007A - Age by 5 year age bands #> 4                                                         TS021 - Ethnic group #> 5                                                             TS030 - Religion #> 6                                                       TS037 - General health #> 7                                       TS062 - Social Classification (NS-SeC) #> 8                                             TS066 - Economic activity status #> 9                                       TS067 - Highest level of qualification #> 10                                TS011 - Households by deprivation dimensions #> 11                                                  TS025 - Household language #> 12                                                  TS044 - Accommodation type #> 13                                             TS045 - Car or van availability #> 14                                                              TS054 - Tenure #> 15                                               TS003 - Household composition

title: Reading CoE statistics
code: coe_stats(nomis_code =  "TS001", level = "england") #>   population lives_in_a_household lives_in_a_communal_establishment #> 1   56506784             55542946                          963837.8 coe_stats(nomis_code = "TS001", level = "diocese", areas = 1) #>   diocese_name diocese_number population lives_in_a_household #> 1 Bath & Wells              1     979315             959638.4 #>   lives_in_a_communal_establishment #> 1                          19676.56

title: Reading CoE statistics
code: coe_parish_in_context(parish_code = "370047", nomis_codes = "TS001") #> ✔ Reading from coe-parishes-2024. #> ✔ Range ''parishes''. #> ✔ Reading from coeparishdata_parish-data. #> ✔ Range ''TS001''. #> Warning in out[code] <- rbind(parish_stats[[code]], diocese_stats[[code]], : #> number of items to replace is not a multiple of replacement length #> $TS001 #> [1] "parish" "parish" "nation"

text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example: plot chunk pressure case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(coeparishdata) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: View nomis codes of available data — coe_nomis_codes
title: View nomis codes of available data — coe_nomis_codes
View nomis codes of available data — coe_nomis_codes
View nomis codes of available data — coe_nomis_codes
text: description Logical. TRUE, (default), tibble returned contains nomis codes corresponding dataset descriptions. false, character vector containing nomis codes returned.

title: View nomis codes of available data — coe_nomis_codes
text: tibble nomis codes dataset descriptions, character vector nomis codes

title: View nomis codes of available data — coe_nomis_codes
code: coe_nomis_codes() #> # A tibble: 15 × 2 #>    nomis_code description                                                        #>    <chr>      <chr>                                                              #>  1 TS001      TS001 - Number of usual residents in households and communal esta… #>  2 TS004      TS004 - Country of birth                                           #>  3 TS007A     TS007A - Age by 5 year age bands                                   #>  4 TS021      TS021 - Ethnic group                                               #>  5 TS030      TS030 - Religion                                                   #>  6 TS037      TS037 - General health                                             #>  7 TS062      TS062 - Social Classification (NS-SeC)                             #>  8 TS066      TS066 - Economic activity status                                   #>  9 TS067      TS067 - Highest level of qualification                             #> 10 TS011      TS011 - Households by deprivation dimensions                       #> 11 TS025      TS025 - Household language                                         #> 12 TS044      TS044 - Accommodation type                                         #> 13 TS045      TS045 - Car or van availability                                    #> 14 TS054      TS054 - Tenure                                                     #> 15 TS003      TS003 - Household composition

what: Get a (list of) comparative table(s) of local, diocesan and national data for a given parish — coe_parish_in_context
title: Get a (list of) comparative table(s) of local, diocesan and national data for a given parish — coe_parish_in_context
text: Extracts parish, diocese national level data given parish, base::rbinds single table. Iterates nomis_codes output list tables

title: Get a (list of) comparative table(s) of local, diocesan and national data for a given parish — coe_parish_in_context
code: coe_parish_in_context(   parish_code,   nomis_codes = coe_nomis_codes(description = FALSE),   relative = FALSE )

title: Get a (list of) comparative table(s) of local, diocesan and national data for a given parish — coe_parish_in_context
text: parish_code single parish code. Character. nomis_codes character vector nomis_codes. relative Logical. outputs relative? Default FALSE.

title: Get a (list of) comparative table(s) of local, diocesan and national data for a given parish — coe_parish_in_context
Get a (list of) comparative table(s) of local, diocesan and national data for a given parish — coe_parish_in_context
code: coe_parish_in_context(parish_code = "370047", nomis_codes = "TS001") #> ✔ Reading from coe-parishes-2024. #> ✔ Range ''parishes''. #> ✔ Reading from coeparishdata_parish-data. #> ✔ Range ''TS001''. #> Warning: number of items to replace is not a multiple of replacement length #> $TS001 #> [1] "parish" "parish" "nation" #>

what: Get Census data for the Church of England at a parish, diocesan or national level. — coe_stats
title: Get Census data for the Church of England at a parish, diocesan or national level. — coe_stats
text: Get Census data Church England parish, diocesan national level.

title: Get Census data for the Church of England at a parish, diocesan or national level. — coe_stats
Get Census data for the Church of England at a parish, diocesan or national level. — coe_stats
text: nomis_code Nomis code required data. Must one coe_nomis_codes(). level geographical level data required. Must one 'parish', 'diocese' 'england'. areas character vector parish codes diocese numbers. specified, returned tibble contain data areas. used level = 'england'. NA values removed.

title: Get Census data for the Church of England at a parish, diocesan or national level. — coe_stats
code: coe_stats(nomis_code =  "TS001", level = "england") #> # A tibble: 1 × 3 #>   population lives_in_a_household lives_in_a_communal_establishment #>        <dbl>                <dbl>                             <dbl> #> 1   56506784            55542946.                           963838. coe_stats(nomis_code = "TS001", level = "diocese", areas = 1) #> # A tibble: 1 × 5 #>   diocese_name diocese_number population lives_in_a_household #>   <chr>        <chr>               <dbl>                <dbl> #> 1 Bath & Wells 1                  979315              959638. #> # ℹ 1 more variable: lives_in_a_communal_establishment <dbl>

title: coeparishdata (development version)
